page.title: 14Medical Services
page.content: Most people go to the doctors in Dulverton,even some living in Devon who might be expected to go to Bampton or the weekly surgery in Oakford. Health visitors and District Nurses work with the doctors practices. The nearest dentist is in Dulverton. Somerset Hospitals are in Taunton, (25 miles),or Minehead(over 20 miles). Patients are often sent for X_rays to Tiverton Hospital(12 miles) in Devon. There is some crossing of county boundaries in both directions in the use of hospitals but ambulances do not cross county boundaries.Hospital cars are very necessary,as patients have to travel to Taunton to give blood samples as there is no courier service for the Dulverton practice to enable samples to reach the Pathology lab quickly enough.
